title: Vadodara & Gujarat
short_description: Home to the grandiose Laxmi Vilas Palace and the Maratha Gaekwads.
long_description:
Vadodara (Baroda) is the cultural capital of Gujarat and the seat of the Gaekwad dynasty. The Laxmi Vilas Palace here is four times the size of Buckingham Palace, a testament to the family's immense wealth and taste.

While the main palace is a private residence and museum, the royal hospitality can be experienced at properties like Madhav Bagh. This 19th-century noble home offers a more intimate glimpse into the lifestyle of the Maratha aristocracy in Gujarat, blending Maharashtrian culture with Gujarati warmth.

properties.title: Madhav Bagh
properties.short_description: A 125-year-old heritage homestay run by the royal family, offering an intimate cultural experience.

how_to_reach: Vadodara has its own airport and is a major railway hub.
